ValidationRule.description: If task subject is 'Task Assigment'. Who is not creator cannot edit Sub task and Due Date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: if( AND( LOWER(Subject ) = 'task assignment'), if($User.Id != CreatedBy.Id ,if( OR(ISCHANGED( Sub_Task__c ),ISCHANGED( ActivityDate )),true,false) , false),false)
